GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the requested article_id

exampleResponse.title: They're not exactly dogs, are they?
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects corresponding to the requested article_id

comments.body: This is a bad article name
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a newly posted comment object with the given article_id
